name: Hively Tracker Module
summary: An HVL file is an audio module created by Hively Tracker, a music tracker based on the AHX tracker for Amiga computers. It contains binary data used to play synthesized music. When opened in Hively Tracker, an HVL file appears as a set of tracks, notes, and other song data.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: HVL file open in Hively Tracker
images.alt: HVL file open in Hively Tracker
